title: Busco Scrim para jugar ahora a la noche, oro/platino/diamante.
body: Lo de arriba, agreguenme al juego y hablamos bien gogogo

replies.body: alguien me dice que es o que significa scrim?

Scrim is the shortened word for "scrimmage", which usually means the teams will play against each other to practice. So it's basically a match between two teams who want to practice. (http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1751410)
abre traductor de google o glooglealo tú, dale.. no seas tan flojito xd
